mapper.select: --사용자정보 조회 SELECT A.USR_ID, A.USR_NM, A.USR_GRP_CD FROM SY_USR_INFO A WHERE A.USR_ID = #{USR_ID} AND A.USR_PW = #{USR_PW} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1

-- 사용자 메뉴 목록 조회 SELECT A.ORGA_CD, A.PGM_ID, A.PGM_NM, A.PGM_PATH, A.PGM_YN, A.USE_YN, A.BTN_SRCH_YN, A.BTN_SAVE_YN, A.BTN_DEL_YN, A.BTN_ETC_1_YN, A.BTN_ETC_2_YN, A.BTN_ETC_3_YN, A.BTN_ETC_4_YN, A.BTN_ETC_5_YN, A.BTN_ETC_1_LABEL, A.BTN_ETC_2_LABEL, A.BTN_ETC_3_LABEL, A.BTN_ETC_4_LABEL, A.BTN_ETC_5_LABEL, 'Y' IS_RUN_YN, A.RMK, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.REG_IP, A.UPD_DT, A.UPD_ID, A.UPD_IP FROM SY_PGM_INFO A WHERE A.PGM_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PGM_ID
